          101100011011101100111110000100011111011001101
          100000101100100011000111110101000100000011001
wrong:   1001101001001001111110110001001100011011100110
correct: 1001101001000010000000101111001100011011100110


z00 = x00 xor y00
c00 = x00 and y00

z01 = (x01 xor y01) xor c00
c01 = (z01 and c00) or (x01 and y01)

z02 = (x02 xor y02) xor c01
c02 = (z02 and c01) or (x02 and y02)

"z19","vwp","z25","mps","vjv","cqm","vcv", "z13"
